main.name: Colin Hayes
main.description: I'm a fourth-year college student pursuing a B.S. in Computer Science and a Minor in Mathematics, looking for a full-time position as a software engineer or closely related field after I graduate in December of 2020
main.bio: I'm an aspiring software developer who's about to graduate college this December. Outside of work and school I like building things, whether it's with wood or wires or maybe both, and being outside playing golf or running.
main.contactmessage: Send me a message if you have any questions and I'll get back to you as soon as possible.

education.degree: B.S. in Computer Science, Minor in Mathematics

description: Davenport Central Golf Team Varsity Captain (2014-2017)

work.title: Web Developer Intern
description: Developed 27 mobile friendly, responsive web apps utilizing Squarespace, JavaScript, HTML, and CSS for a wide variety of brands including large names like GoOats, Ford Gum, Strassburger Steaks, as well as family businesses and clinics.
Generated over 430,000 unique viewers, 1,000,000 page views, and $640,000 for clients across the many ecommerce, blog, and homepage websites detailed in my portfolio over 10 months.
Increased web development team performance by 25% through helping facilitate a transition to a scrum development cycle using Trello integrated with Slack.

work.title: Yard Worker
description: Ensured all bases were covered throughout the lumber, filling in wherever needed it by being cross trained in the board shed, garden center, and receiving departments.

work.title: Summer Intern
description: Increased team productivity by 20% by formatting, creating, and maintaining Creo CAD design projects.
Upheld company relations and offsite operations by replacing or exchanging parts with clients across Iowa and Illinois.
Ensured OSHA compliance and operator safety by performing physical safety inspections on over 4,000 slings and riggings.

work.title: Engineering Apprentice
description: Organized the software development team by designing, building, and implementing a link management system with C# backend, HTML & CSS frontend, and XML storage which was used daily by the development team.
Earned exceptional marks on my link management project after presenting it to the board of directors at the end of my Science and Engineering Apprenticeship Program (SEAP) program.

work.company: Windsor Crest Swim and Tennis Club
work.title: Lifeguard
description: Ensured the safety of swimmers by keeping watch.
Ensured the safety of the pools by performing chemical checks and balances multiple times per day.

achievements.title: Google Hashcode 2020 University of Iowa Hub Gold Medalist
Google Tech Challenge 2020 University of Iowa Winner
